attributes.action: Stop legal aid for and deport illegal immigrants
attributes.additional_details: The nhs is under massive strain, gp appointments are a long wait. Green space is getting used to build more housing and the tax payer is footing the bill for illegal immigrants to stay in hotels and to live while our services our being cut.
attributes.background: Stop using our tax payers money to stop the deportations it illegal immigrants especially criminals when there is a shortage of services, homeless people and poverty in our coontry
